entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: The context provided is a short email message that expresses uncertainty about subscribing to a list related to mbtc vs ubtc. The sender mentions that it is not a big deal and may be a default setting. There is also an attachment mentioned, which is an HTML file that has been scrubbed of its URL.Overall, the message is brief and does not provide much detail. It appears to be a casual communication between individuals who are familiar with the topic at hand. The mention of a default setting suggests that the list may be related to a software or technology platform that uses mbtc and ubtc as units of measurement. However, without more information, it is difficult to determine the exact nature of the list or the purpose it serves.The attachment mentioned in the message is an HTML file that has been scrubbed of its URL. It is unclear why the sender included this information or what the contents of the file may be. It is possible that the file contains additional information about the mbtc vs ubtc topic or is related to the list being discussed.In conclusion, the context provided is a short email message that expresses uncertainty about subscribing to a list related to mbtc vs ubtc. The sender mentions that it is not a big deal and may be a default setting. There is also an attachment mentioned, which is an HTML file that has been scrubbed of its URL. Without more information, it is difficult to determine the exact nature of the list or the purpose it serves.
